job.title: Operations Engineer, Contractor Private Cloud (VMware)
job.description: <p><strong><u>Operations Engineer, Contractor Private Cloud (VMware)</u></strong></p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Responsibilities:</strong></p><ul><li>Support the VMware IaaS platform and supporting infrastructure across the globe and ensure consistent availability.</li><li>This includes:</li><li>Using existing automation tools to perform day-to-day operations duties</li><li>Develop automation to continue to drive proactive detection and remediation of issues</li><li>Identify and tackle hardware/software issues with vendors</li><li>Respond to inquiries and requests from other teams</li><li>Facilitate ticket creation and ticket assignment</li><li>Enforce change control processes</li><li>Maintain good documentation and templates</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Requirements:</strong></p><ul><li>5+ years of experience supporting a 24x7 production environment</li><li>5+ years of experience building and maintaining VMware vSphere 6.x platforms</li><li>3+ years coding Python</li><li>Have working experience with Ansible, git, Jenkins, Atlassian products</li><li>Other Qualifications</li><li>Experience and knowledge in Linux support and administration</li><li>Experience running a fleet of servers, FC switches and storage</li><li>Experience with HashiCorp Vault is a plus</li><li>Must possess excellent written and verbal skills</li></ul>
